Class DocumentService

public class DocumentService
extends Object
    Document service for creating and managing documents.

public Document createDocument(String name,
                                              String authorUsername,
                                              String description,
                                              String dType,
                                              String currentTime)
        Method to create new document.
        Parameters:
        name - of the document
        authorUsername - is the username of user creating the document
        description - string value describing the document
        dType - is document type
        currentTime - local system time
        Returns:
        Document type object
